message: Let's start with a fair split, we can always negotiate later.
You started high, now I'll counter. Will you meet me in the middle?
You said I started high, but I think I'm being reasonable now. Meet me here or I'll walk away.
You're right, you are being reasonable now. But I think I can do better than that. Will you meet me at 500k?
I'm not willing to meet you at 50-50. I think I deserve a bit more, considering the original proposal and the negotiations so far.
I'm not willing to give up more than 52% of the original amount. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
